title: Linguaphone Language Courses Collection
description:
Established in 1901, Linguaphone was a pioneer in self-study language learning and first to recognise the potential of the wax cylinder and later records. Lingua Phone courses allowed language learners to study at their own pace using original recordings supported by Linguaphone's proven methodology: Listen, Understand, Speak. In both the classroom and via its self-study programmes, Linguaphone has played a dominant role in language-learning across the globe ever since.

This collection includes the following languages (books in pdf + rar audio files) 

01 English
02 German
03 Dutch
04 Afrikaans
05 Danish
06 Norwegian
07 Icelandic
08 Irish Gaelic
09 Welsh
10 Serbo-Croatian
11 Polish
12 Russian
13 French
14 Italian
15 Spanish
16 Portuguese
17 Hindi
18 Finnish
19 Hebrew
20 Egyptian Arabic
21 Modern Standard Arabic
22 Indonesian
23 Malay
24 Chinese
25 Japanese
26 Korean
27 Thai
28 Swedish
